casebody.data:
PEOPLE State of Illinois, respondent,
v.
David P. STAFFORD, petitioner. No. 121393 Supreme Court of Illinois. November 22, 2017

Petition for Leave to Appeal Denied.

In the exercise of this Court's supervisory authority, the Appellate Court, Fourth District, is directed to vacate its judgment in People v. Stafford, case No. 4-14-0309 (09/01/16). The appellate court is directed to consider the effect of this Court's opinion in People v. Holman, 2017 IL 120655, on the issue of whether defendant's sentence violates the eighth amendment to the United States Constitution, and determine if a different result is warranted.
